Detailed Description

This class implements the ecotype interface, using an array of visuals as source material.

The visuals are simple placed down on the terrain and oriented.

bool VisualsEcotype::isEmpty (  )  const [virtual]

This method returns true if the ecotype is empty.

Being empty means it will not draw any detail objects, and neighbouring ecotypes will not encroach.

Implements EcotypeGenerator.
